EmailTemplate.name: Case: 2) Notification of Assignment and preliminary timeline
EmailTemplate.subject: Manager for Case #{!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
{!Case.Assigned_to__c} will be working with you to resolve your case (sent as: {!Case.Subject}).
We received this request on {!Case.CreatedDate} and are looking to have a solution ready for your review on {!Case.Review_Date__c}. This will allow your request to Go-Live in production on {!Case.Go_Live_Date__c}.
Feel free to follow the progress of your case using the link below and, if you have any questions, comments, or concerns please submit these as a New Case Comment on the record.
{!Case.Link}
Thank you, your Salesforce Team
